Text:
Felt a shock run down my tail... This one's no
weakling!
Ahaha... Am I that scary to you?
...Okay, a bit of damage...! This thing is strong!

I've got it beat when it comes to strength...
and speed...but...!

...Ah, right, Gamma said that even if you land
a blow, it'll heal in no time flat...!
You're a sneaky one, aren't you!

You may be big, but I'm the third strongest after
Boss man and Lady Alpha!
I wanna hunt it down like Boss man!!!

That time, Boss man slowly breathed in and out and
defeated me...

If I do what Boss man did, maybe my strength will
increase...?

I did it! I really am strong! No way I'd lose to
someone like this!

...If you heal so quickly, then I'll break you apart
with one blow! That way, you'll die before healing!
